Package network.client

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • network.client.Client
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, GameClient
    public class Client
extends java.lang.Object
implements GameClient, java.lang.Runnable
    Represents a Client for the Othello game.

      • run

        public void run()
        The run method of the Runnable class Client. It receives messages from the server according to the protocol and acts accordingly. Also deals with disconnections from the server.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
